Colombia decree suspends ceasefire with EMC armed group in three areasColombia will suspend its months-long ceasefire with the Estado Mayor Central (ECM) armed group in three provinces on Wednesday, a government decree said on Sunday, citing incidents of violence that broke the ceasefire. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 20:00:53 GMT FZCTJSTL2BPTPDGQVVNADOC54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-suspends-ceasefire-with-emc-armed-group- Three-areas-decree-2024-03-17/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
Moldova dismisses reported drone strike in breakaway enclave as provocationOfficials in Moldova's pro-Russian, separatist Transdniestria enclave said a drone launched from Ukraine's Odesa region blew up a helicopter on military territory on Sunday, local media said, but pro-European Moldova immediately dismissed the report. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 19:19:00 GMT XI53FREEPJHIDINSKQF25TQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-dismisses-reported-drone-strike-breakaway-enclave-pro Vocation-2024-03-17/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Russians in Latvia vote in presidential election, and some protest against PutinRussian citizens in Latvia cast ballots in their home country's presidential election on Sunday, while opponents of President Vladimir Putin rallied in front of the embassy in Riga in a peaceful "noon against Putin" protest. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:55:56 GMT BKXUVXBSPJI4PHRGXDCMK64OUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russians-latvia-vote-presidential-election-some-protest-against-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
UNICEF says over 13,000 children killed in Gaza in Israel offensiveThe U.N. children's agency said on Sunday over 13,000 children have been killed in Gaza in Israel's offensive, adding many kids were suffering from severe malnutrition and did not "even have the energy to cry." Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:48:43 GMT Y5GVSBQJ3JK57HNV7A7REQUZ3E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unicef-says-over-13000-children-killed-in-gaza-israel-offective-2024-03-17/Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
Reactions abroad to Russia's presidential electionFollowing are reactions from foreign governments and officials to Russia's presidential election, which handed Vladimir Putin a landslide win and another six-year term in office, according to first official results on Sunday. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:30:43 GMT M7VPUWBWHZIBLKW2MFW5NEENUM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/reactions- Russian-presidential-election-abroad-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says Russian elections illegitimate 'imitation'Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday that Russian President Vladimir Putin wanted to rule forever and that Russia's presidential election was an illegitimate imitation. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:26:23 GMT 4PBZBDKDRVK7NCGURQ5GH2I57Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-says- Russian-election-illegitimate-imitation-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Thousands of Russians vote in Serbia, Montenegro, many say they oppose PutinThousands of Russian citizens in Serbia and Montenegro voted on Sunday in their home nation's presidential election, with many saying it was a symbolic gesture that would not impact President Vladimir Putin's bid for another six-year term. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:12:01 GMT FHB4OAS32JKYPPO3R7P5T3KSSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thousands- Russians-vote-serbia-montenegro-many-say-they-oppose-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
EU's von der Leyen says Gaza facing famine, ceasefire needed rapidlyEuropean Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Sunday that Gaza was facing famine and there had to be a rapid ceasefire agreement in the war between Israel and Hamas. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:51:41 GMT BDMVS2L7NVNDVH3MPVQYL6TTFU https://www.reuters.com/world/eus-von-der-leyen-says-gaza-faceing-famine-ceasefire-urgently-needed-2024-03-17/Reuters世界
Ukraine says Russian missile attack kills one, injures 8 in MykolaivA man was killed and at least eight people were wounded in a Russian missile attack on the Black Sea port city of Mykolaiv on Sunday, Ukrainian officials said, after an overnight strike on Odesa on the last day of Russia's presidential election. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:24:00 GMT CACHPTHUPVMG7G7Y46PBK3M6I4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says- Russian-missile-attack-injures-mykolaiv-city-6-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Swiss police stop far-right Austrian politician speaking at eventA far-right Austrian politician was stopped by the police from speaking at an event in the Swiss canton of Aargau on Saturday after the organisers didn't comply with a police request for the event to be cancelled. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 15:19:11 GMT LSTY2QVDT5LRFOEYHI6QJNM7LA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-police-stop-far-right-austrian-politician-speaking-event-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Some Russians flock to Navalny's grave to 'cast their vote,' TV footage showsDozens of Russians flocked to Alexei Navalny's grave in Moscow on Sunday to symbolically cast their vote for the late opposition politician on the last day of Russia's presidential election, TV footage showed. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 14:49:23 GMT 2RHFKC23TJKI3CXQDZP5NO3H5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/some- Russian-flock-navalnys-grave-cast-their-vote-tv-footage-shows-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
